text: Longlegs is a 2024 American horror thriller movie written and directed by Osgood Perkins. It stars Maika Monroe and Nicolas Cage. The movie is about an FBI agent who works to find an occultist serial killer responsible for murdering multiple families in Oregon, without having been physically present in the crimes. Longlegs was released in the United States by Neon on July 12, 2024. It received positive reviews from critics. ==References== Category:2024 horror movies Category:2024 thriller movies Category:2020s horror thriller movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:American serial killer movies Category:Movies set in the 1990s Category:Movies about cults Category:American crime thriller movies Category:2020s English-language movies Category:2020s crime thriller movies Category:2020s psychological movies Category:American psychological movies Category:American supernatural movies Category:Movies about murder Category:Movies set in Oregon Category:Religious horror movies
title: Longlegs
